chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: If ye then be risen with Christ, seek those things which are above, where Christ sitteth on the right hand of God.
items.plainText: If ye then be risen with Christ, seek those things which are above, where Christ sitteth on the right hand of God.

items.text: Set your affection on things above, not on things on the earth.
items.plainText: Set your affection on things above, not on things on the earth.

items.text: For ye are dead, and your life is hid with Christ in God.
items.plainText: For ye are dead, and your life is hid with Christ in God.

items.text: When Christ, who is our life, shall appear, then shall ye also appear with him in glory.
items.plainText: When Christ, who is our life, shall appear, then shall ye also appear with him in glory.

items.text: Mortify therefore your members which are upon the earth; fornication, uncleanness, inordinate affection, evil concupiscence, and covetousness, which is idolatry:
items.plainText: Mortify therefore your members which are upon the earth; fornication, uncleanness, inordinate affection, evil concupiscence, and covetousness, which is idolatry:

items.text: For which things' sake the wrath of God cometh on the children of disobedience:
items.plainText: For which things' sake the wrath of God cometh on the children of disobedience:

items.text: In the which ye also walked some time, when ye lived in them.
items.plainText: In the which ye also walked some time, when ye lived in them.

items.text: But now ye also put off all these; anger, wrath, malice, blasphemy, filthy communication out of your mouth.
items.plainText: But now ye also put off all these; anger, wrath, malice, blasphemy, filthy communication out of your mouth.

items.text: Lie not one to another, seeing that ye have put off the old man with his deeds;
items.plainText: Lie not one to another, seeing that ye have put off the old man with his deeds;

items.text: And have put on the new man, which is renewed in knowledge after the image of him that created him:
items.plainText: And have put on the new man, which is renewed in knowledge after the image of him that created him:

items.text: Where there is neither Greek nor Jew, circumcision nor uncircumcision, Barbarian, Scythian, bond nor free: but Christ is all, and in all.
items.plainText: Where there is neither Greek nor Jew, circumcision nor uncircumcision, Barbarian, Scythian, bond nor free: but Christ is all, and in all.

items.text: Put on therefore, as the elect of God, holy and beloved, bowels of mercies, kindness, humbleness of mind, meekness, longsuffering;
items.plainText: Put on therefore, as the elect of God, holy and beloved, bowels of mercies, kindness, humbleness of mind, meekness, longsuffering;

items.text: Forbearing one another, and forgiving one another, if any man have a quarrel against any: even as Christ forgave you, so also do ye.
items.plainText: Forbearing one another, and forgiving one another, if any man have a quarrel against any: even as Christ forgave you, so also do ye.

items.text: And above all these things put on charity, which is the bond of perfectness.
items.plainText: And above all these things put on charity, which is the bond of perfectness.

items.text: And let the peace of God rule in your hearts, to the which also ye are called in one body; and be ye thankful.
items.plainText: And let the peace of God rule in your hearts, to the which also ye are called in one body; and be ye thankful.

items.text: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord.
items.plainText: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord.

items.text: And whatsoever ye do in word or deed, do all in the name of the Lord Jesus, giving thanks to God and the Father by him.
items.plainText: And whatsoever ye do in word or deed, do all in the name of the Lord Jesus, giving thanks to God and the Father by him.

items.text: Wives, submit yourselves unto your own husbands, as it is fit in the Lord.
items.plainText: Wives, submit yourselves unto your own husbands, as it is fit in the Lord.

items.text: Husbands, love your wives, and be not bitter against them.
items.plainText: Husbands, love your wives, and be not bitter against them.

items.text: Children, obey your parents in all things: for this is well pleasing unto the Lord.
items.plainText: Children, obey your parents in all things: for this is well pleasing unto the Lord.

items.text: Fathers, provoke not your children to anger, lest they be discouraged.
items.plainText: Fathers, provoke not your children to anger, lest they be discouraged.

items.text: Servants, obey in all things your masters according to the flesh; not with eyeservice, as menpleasers; but in singleness of heart, fearing God:
items.plainText: Servants, obey in all things your masters according to the flesh; not with eyeservice, as menpleasers; but in singleness of heart, fearing God:

items.text: And whatsoever ye do, do it heartily, as to the Lord, and not unto men;
items.plainText: And whatsoever ye do, do it heartily, as to the Lord, and not unto men;

items.text: Knowing that of the Lord ye shall receive the reward of the inheritance: for ye serve the Lord Christ.
items.plainText: Knowing that of the Lord ye shall receive the reward of the inheritance: for ye serve the Lord Christ.

items.text: But he that doeth wrong shall receive for the wrong which he hath done: and there is no respect of persons.
items.plainText: But he that doeth wrong shall receive for the wrong which he hath done: and there is no respect of persons.
